SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(DocEntry),SUM(DocTotal) FROM ORFQ (NOLOCK) WHERE (DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2') AND (CardName LIKE '%'+':3'+'%') AND Canceled <> 'C' AND (Canceled = ':4' OR ':4' IS NULL OR ':4' = '') AND (DocStatus = ':5' OR ':5' IS NULL OR ':5' = '') AND (U_IDU_PT = ':6' OR ':6' IS NULL OR ':6' = '') AND (DocType = ':7' OR ':7' IS NULL OR ':7' = '') AND (DocNum LIKE '%'+':8'+'%') :9
select DocEntry, ObjType, CardCode, CardName, GroupCode, E_Mail, Phone1, Phone2 from ocrd C where C.CardType = 'S' and C.validFor = 'Y' and C.E_mail is not null and C.E_Mail <> '' :1 :2

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,71}) OR Trim({0,71}) = '', '', ' and C.CardCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,71}) & ASCIIChr(39))
IF(ISNULL({0,82}) OR Trim({0,82}) = '', '', ' and C.CardName like ' & ASCIIChr(39) & '%' & Trim({0,82}) & '%' & ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DocEntry, ObjType, CardCode, CardName, GroupCode, E_Mail, Phone1, Phone2 from ocrd C where C.CardType = 'S' and C.validFor = 'Y' and C.E_mail is not null and C.E_Mail <> '' :1 :2

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,71}) OR Trim({0,71}) = '', '', ' and C.CardCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,71})&ASCIIChr(39))
IF(ISNULL({0,82}) OR Trim({0,82}) = '', '', ' and C.CardName LIKE ' & ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,82})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CardCode, CardName, E_mail from ocrd where CardCode in (:1)

select CONDITION, GCM_ID, DESCRIPTION, GCM_NUM, GCM_NOTE1, GCM_NOTE2, FACTIVE from sys_gcm (nolock) where condition = 'SETUP' and gcm_id IN ('MAILIP', 'MAILPASS', 'MAILPORT', 'MAILSENDER', 'MAILSSL', 'MAILUSER')
